messages.title: A fairer and greener future for all

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By 2020 there will be more than 1.2 million green jobs.
The NHS is the Labour Party's greatest achievement. We created the NHS, we saved it, we value it and we will always support it.
We have doubled spending for public schools to open more spaces. Next we will provide catch up tuition so that all children learn primary school secure in the '3Rs'.
1.5 million new green jobs will be supported by Labour.
I will fight for more Affordable Housing in the Cotswolds.

Faced with a global financial crisis, Labour controlled the deficit. Overcoming the banking crisis, we ensured families, individuals, and businesses did not suffer from excessive spending cuts and home repossessions.

housing.content: I will fight for more Affordable Housing in the Cotswolds.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe in a society for the many rather than the few; that education is vital to ensuring every child has a chance to fulfill their potential, and that together we can forge a fairer and greener future.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working in environmental sector. Creating the Climate Change Act. Doubling spending for public schools.
Worked in Westminster and have knowledge of Brussels to get things done for the people of The Cotswolds.

endorsements.endorsement: Mark is a great local candidate – he was born and grew up in Gloucestershire. He's passionate for people and the environment; and having worked in Westminster, he knows how to get things done. He has just what it takes for the Cotswolds, outward looking.

quotes.text: Mark is a great local candidate – he was born and grew up in Gloucestershire. He's passionate for people and the environment; and having worked in Westminster, he knows how to get things done. He has just what it takes for the Cotswolds, outward looking.
quotes.source: David Drew, MP for Stroud since 1997
